description:
This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your VMware vSphere Tanzu Kubernetes Grid environment, with metrics from your vSphere hosts and VMs, along with information about your Kubernetes cluster and its containers.

Further reading for vSphere Tanzu Kubernetes Grid monitoring:

- [VMware Tanzu TKG Docs](https://tanzu.vmware.com/kubernetes-grid)
- [Datadog's vSphere Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vsphere/)
- [Datadog's Kubernetes Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/)
- [Datadog's KSM Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kubernetes_state_core/?tab=operator)
- [Datadog's Kubernetes Metrics Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/data_collected/)

Clone this template dashboard to make changes and add your own graph widgets.
title: VMware vSphere TKG - Overview

definition.content:
### Our VMware vSphere Tanzu Kubernetes Grid (TKG) dashboard gives you broad visibility into your vCenter and its Kubernetes environment

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your VMware vSphere Tanzu Kubernetes Grid environment, with metrics from your vSphere hosts and VMs, along with information about your Kubernetes cluster and its containers.

Further reading for vSphere Tanzu Kubernetes Grid monitoring:

- [VMware Tanzu TKG Docs](https://tanzu.vmware.com/kubernetes-grid)
- [Datadog's vSphere Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vsphere/)
- [Datadog's Kubernetes Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/)
- [Datadog's KSM Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kubernetes_state_core/?tab=operator)
- [Datadog's Kubernetes Metrics Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/data_collected/)

definition.query: source:(vsphere OR kubernetes OR containerd OR docker OR datadog) $vsphere_host $vsphere_cluster $vsphere_vcenter $kube_container_name
definition.title: VMware TKG Events

definition.content:
This group of metrics is generated from the [Kubernetes](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/data_collected/) integration and the [Kubernetes State Metrics Core](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kubernetes_state_core) integration. 

These metrics show detailed information about your Kubernetes pods, allowing for easy drill down to seamlessly pinpoint problems.

definition.title: Pods in Ready State By Node
Pods in Bad State (Not Ready) by Namespace
Containers in Waiting State by Reason

definition.content:
This group of metrics is collected via the VMware vCenter API using the [vSphere integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vsphere/). 

These metrics allow for easy visualization of the overall states of Hosts, VMs, and Datastores in your vSphere environment
